languages.text: "Я отыскала провидцев Крудараха... но вместо облегчения и покоя истина об их судьбе наполнила мое сердце горечью".
"I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."
languages.original_text: "Я отыскала провидцев Крудараха... но вместо облегчения и покоя истина об их судьбе наполнила мое сердце горечью".

traits.locale_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

traits.locale_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我找到了克鲁达拉赫的先知……但他们命运的真相并没有为我带来宽慰与平静，反而让我心中充满了痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

traits.locale_text: “我找到了克鲁达拉赫的先知……但他们命运的真相并没有为我带来宽慰与平静，反而让我心中充满了痛苦。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai retrouvé les Grands Prophètes de Crudarach... mais au lieu de m'apporter la paix, la vérité sur ce qui leur est arrivé a rempli mon cœur d'amertume. »
languages.original_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai retrouvé les Grands Prophètes de Crudarach... mais au lieu de m'apporter la paix, la vérité sur ce qui leur est arrivé a rempli mon cœur d'amertume. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Busqué a los Videntes de Crudarach... pero en vez de alivio y paz, la verdad de su destino llenó mi corazón de amargura».
languages.original_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

traits.locale_text: «Busqué a los Videntes de Crudarach... pero en vez de alivio y paz, la verdad de su destino llenó mi corazón de amargura».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私はクルダラの先見司を探したが…その運命の真相を知って、私の心は安息と安寧ではなく、苦しみに満ちた」
languages.original_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

traits.locale_text: 「私はクルダラの先見司を探したが…その運命の真相を知って、私の心は安息と安寧ではなく、苦しみに満ちた」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe nach den Runenpropheten von Crudarach gesucht ... doch statt mir Erleichterung und Frieden zu schenken, hat die Wahrheit über ihr Schicksal mein Herz nur mit Verbitterung gefüllt."
languages.original_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nach den Runenpropheten von Crudarach gesucht ... doch statt mir Erleichterung und Frieden zu schenken, hat die Wahrheit über ihr Schicksal mein Herz nur mit Verbitterung gefüllt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

languages.text: "Crudarach'taki Ötesezenlere ulaştım... Fakat kaderlerinin hakikati, yüreğime iç rahatlığı ve barış yerine acı getirdi."
languages.original_text: "I sought out the Farseers of Crudarach... but instead of relief and peace, the truth of their fate filled my heart with bitterness."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach Ötesezenlerini aradım... Fakat kaderlerinin hakikati, yüreğime iç rahatlığı ve barış yerine acı getirdi."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
